title: december 30: in living color
description:
Today on the pod, Maia talks about the race to manufacture the first color TV. Then she talks about the beginning of Pink Guy’s career, and how he transitioned from comedy into music. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
